content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Setup at position(1.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (1.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest (1.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter (1.5, -57.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line at position(1.0, 1.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (1.0, 1.0) - Currently smelting iron ore
- Stone furnace (3.0, 1.0) 
- Wooden chests (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), (5.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserters (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (5.5, 2.5)

### Secondary Smelting Setup at position(2.0, 7.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces (2.0, 7.0), (4.0, 7.0)
- Wooden chests (2.5, 9.5), (4.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserters (2.5, 8.5), (4.5, 8.5), (3.5, 9.5)

### Assembly Line Complex at position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (14.5, 14.5) - Set for copper cable production
- Multiple wooden chests (8.5, 10.5), (14.5, 11.5), (21.5, 11.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material handling
- Second assembling machine (21.5, 15.5) - Set for electronic circuit production
- Output chest (24.5, 15.5) containing electronic circuits

### Water Pumping System
Consists of:
- Offshore pumps at (-5.5, 26.5), (2.5, 34.5), (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting pumps
- Boiler (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine (29.5, 51.5)

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production areas, forming a logistics network throughout the factory.

### Power Distribution
Electricity network (ID: 32608) with multiple electric poles connecting various parts of the factory.

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting complex items
- Break down complex recipes into their base components
- Ensure all prerequisite items are craftable before attempting to craft advanced items
- Set up proper production chains for basic materials before attempting advanced crafting

### Errors related to item extraction
- Verify items are actually present in the source before attempting extraction
- Wait for smelting/crafting operations to complete before attempting to extract products
- Check the status of machines to ensure they are actually producing before attempting extraction

### Power and machine operation errors
- Ensure power network is properly connected and functioning
- Verify machines have required resources (fuel, raw materials) before operation
- Check machine status for specific issues (no power, missing ingredients, etc.)

### Fluid system errors
- Ensure proper connection of fluid-carrying entities
- Verify pumps are properly connected to water tiles
- Check pipe connections are complete and properly oriented
